sentences.en: "When can I see him?" Her tone was insistent now.
sentences.cn: “我什么时候能见他？”她的语气变得坚决。

sentences.en: As she spoke her voice became harsh , insistent, angry.
sentences.cn: 她越往下说,声调越是严历 、 坚决 、 气愤.

sentences.en: But only a block away the insistent English - language spiel disappears.
sentences.cn: 这就是那举世闻名的胡同了.

sentences.en: He is insistent on the advocacy of new scientific methods.
sentences.cn: 他坚持提倡新的科学方法.

sentences.en: He is most insistent on this point.
I did not want to go, but she was insistent.
sentences.cn: 我不想去, 可她坚持要我去.

sentences.en: In spite of the rain he was insistent on going out.
sentences.cn: 尽管下雨,他仍然坚持外出.

sentences.en: She was insistent that they should all meet for dinner.
sentences.cn: 她坚持要大家聚在一起吃晚餐。

sentences.en: Stalin was insistent that this should take place at Teheran.
sentences.cn: 斯大林坚持这个会议应在德黑兰举行.

sentences.en: The doctor demurred, but Piercey was insistent.
sentences.cn: 医生提出异议，但皮尔西却一再坚持。

sentences.en: The men are very insistent that you leave right away.
sentences.cn: 他们坚决要求你立即离开。

sentences.en: There was an insistent knock on my door.
sentences.cn: 我听到一阵急促的敲门声.

sentences.en: They were insistent on having a contract for the work.
sentences.cn: 他们坚持要就这项工作立一份合同。

sentences.en: This new hunger baffled me, scared me, made me angry and insistent.
sentences.cn: 眼下这种饥饿却在扰乱我, 吓唬我, 搞得我又是生气又是倔.

sentences.en: You have had to write checks to stave off the ever - insistent claims of your creditors.
sentences.cn: 你必须很快地据此而开出支票来偿付你的没完没了的欠债.
